definition: Pelé (1940-), Edson Arantes Do Nascimento, Brazilian football star
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
T'bilisi, capital of Georgia 格魯吉亞|格鲁吉亚[Ge2 lu3 ji2 ya4]

pinyin: Yi1 bi3 li4 ya4 Ban4 dao3

sentences.english: The local store has started selling baguettes and Belgian beers.
sentences.chinese: 当地的商店已经开始出售法国棍式面包和比利时啤酒。

sentences.english: Phillips Park was bordered by Pelee Boulevard and Elmhurst.
sentences.chinese: 菲力浦公园的两边是比利大道及艾尔姆霍斯特大街。

sentences.english: But at the moment, it's just France and Belgium.
sentences.chinese: 但是现在，只有法国和比利时。

sentences.english: Iberico ham, fine herbs croutons, Mediterranean Caesar dressing.
sentences.chinese: 伊比利亚火腿，香草面包丁，地中海沙拉汁。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of Cisapride on postoperative colonic peristalsis.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察西沙比利对结肠术后肠运动功能的影响。

sentences.english: 'This was Billy Costacurta's day and he deserved it all.
sentences.chinese: 今天属于比利，他配得上这一切。

sentences.english: "They are a real advance from the past, " Beesley explains.
sentences.chinese: 在过去它们是相当先进的，“比利斯解释说。”

sentences.english: It is not yucky , Billy. Eat it .
The glasses were imported from Belgium, the Jacuzzi from Italy.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃是从比利时进口的，按摩浴缸来自意大利。

sentences.english: Robert: Well, that's you, not me. Please call me Robert from now on.
sentences.chinese: 我的名字叫威廉，但是所有的人都叫我比利。

sentences.english: The Arsenal manager wants to attack Villareal, playing to Arsenal's strengths of free-flowing attacking football.
sentences.chinese: 温格想以阿森纳流畅的进攻来攻击比利亚雷尔。

sentences.english: We have also some severe problems in Belgium because it's a country where they speak different languages.
sentences.chinese: 比利时有很严重的问题，因为人们说不同的语言。

sentences.english: Little Billy is so silly, because he's always.
sentences.chinese: 小比利，太愚蠢，他总是睡不醒。

sentences.chinese: 比利牛斯将法国和西班牙分开。

sentences.chinese: 比利亚的儿子是希别，玛结。

sentences.english: The U-N Development Fund for Women and the government of Belgium organized the conference.
